awards.description: PURPOSE AND ACTIVITIES ARE TO BUILD TRIBAL CAPACITY TO DEVELOP AND MANAGE TRIBAL ENVIRONMENT PROGRAM DEVELOP AN ETEP COMMUNITY OUTREACH NETWORK WITH REGIONAL ORGANIZATIONS AND DEVELOP A COMPOSTING PROGRAM. ANTICIPATED DELIVERABLES AND OUTCOMES ARE TO DEVELOP ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAM TECHNICAL AND ADMINISTRATIVE CAPABILITIES; PRODUCE AN EPA TRIBAL ENVIRONMENTAL PLAN AND COMMUNITY ENVIRONMENTAL OUTREACH MATERIALS; AND LEARN FROM PEER TO PEER MEETINGS AND ENVIRONMENTAL TRAININGS AND WORK WITH COMMUNITY TO DEVELOP SOLID WASTE REDUCTION/COMPOSTING PROGRAM.  INTENDED BENEFICIARY IS THE CLARK'S POINT VILLAGE AND TRIBAL MEMBERS.
